document_name: Phase III Development Partners Support to PRSP Process in Ethiopia.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ETH/00047898/Phase III Development Partners Support to PRSP Process in Ethiopia.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The Project is used for providing support to coordination and facilitation of Development Assistance Group, support to harmonization processes including the High Level Forum secretariat at MOFED, support to formulation of PRSP, support to various DAG structures including Technical Working Groups, and other general issues which are of common interest to the DAG

targets include: Support to HICES, WMs, support to data base management of CSA, Capacity building support to MoFED and CSA, poverty mapping and analysis, participation of the governement official in international conferences and experience sharing visit, strategic studies that informs the M&E system of PASDEP. Enhanced awareness on the PASDEP and MDGs
Strengthened capacity, research and implementation of Eductation sector to strengthen efficiency and effectiveness of education sector as well as policy formulation

This is to ensure:
1. Gender sensitive monitoring and evaluation system mainstreamed in PASDEP
2.  Institutional Capacity of Ministry of Women's Affairs is enhanced
3. Effective participatory dialogue regarding Gender Issues in Ethiopia
